page.title: 16Recreation in Woodford
page.content: As Woodford is a village most of the recreation is on a community basis.If the residents wish to go to the cinema,dancing or to the theatre they either have to go into Stockport or Manchester. Entertainment in the village is centred around clubs and associations which meet in either the British Legion Hall or in Woodford War Memorial Community Centre.Many of the children who attend Queensgate Primary School have connections with many of these clubs. Scouts and Guides both meet in the British Legion Hall on a weekly basis.On Thursday 20th June 1985 the guides held a special 75th anniversary camp fire on the field adjacent to the hall.This field is owned by the people of Woodford.
